questions: Aarav has 7 pencils. Bhavin gives him 5 more pencils. How many pencils does Aarav have now? (Q1)
Chitra has 8 books. Devansh gives her 6 books. How many books does Chitra have? (Q2)
Eshan has 9 apples. Farida gives him 4 apples. How many apples does Eshan have? (Q3)
Gauri has 5 pens. Harshit gives her 3 pens. How many pens does Gauri have? (Q4)
Vishnu has 12 balls. Jiya gives him 7 balls. How many balls does Vishnu have? (Q5)
Kabir has 14 pencils. He gives 6 pencils to Lavanya. How many pencils does Kabir have left? (Q6)
Manan has 18 books. He gives 9 books to Nisha. How many books does Manan have now? (Q7)
Ojas has 20 apples. He eats 8 apples. How many apples are left? (Q8)
Pari has 15 pens. She loses 7 pens. How many pens does Pari have? (Q9)
Ritvik has 13 balls. He gives 5 balls to Sanya. How many balls does Ritvik have? (Q10)
Tanay has 4 pencils, Uday has 5 pencils and Varsha has 3 pencils. How many pencils do they have together? (Q11)
Yamini has 6 books, Zubin has 7 books and Aditi has 2 books. How many books in all? (Q12)
Bharat has 8 apples, Charu has 4 apples and Dhruv has 9 apples. How many apples together? (Q13)
Ekta has 3 pens, Falguni has 5 pens and Gautam has 6 pens. How many pens do they have? (Q14)
Hemant has 10 balls, Isha has 3 balls and Jayesh has 4 balls. How many balls in total? (Q15)
Kiran has 12 pencils. Lata has 5 pencils. How many more pencils does Kiran have? (Q16)
Mohit has 18 books. Neel has 9 books. How many more books does Mohit have? (Q17)
Omkar has 15 apples. Pratik has 7 apples. How many fewer apples does Pratik have? (Q18)
Rashi has 20 pens. Sameer has 14 pens. How many more pens does Rashi have? (Q19)
Tanya has 11 balls. Umang has 8 balls. How many fewer balls does Umang have? (Q20)
Varun has 9 pencils. Wina gives him some more. Now Varun has 15 pencils. How many pencils did Wina give? (Q21)
Xena has some books. Yuvraj gives her 7 books. Now Xena has 13 books. How many books did she have at first? (Q22)
Zara eats 6 apples. She has 8 apples left. How many apples did Zara have before eating? (Q23)
Aditya has 14 pens. Bhumi takes some pens. Now Aditya has 5 pens. How many pens were taken? (Q24)
Chetan has 10 balls. Darsh gives him some balls. Now Chetan has 18 balls. How many were given? (Q25)
Eera has 4 bags. Each bag has 5 pencils. How many pencils does Eera have? (Q26)
Kamal has 3 boxes. Each box has 6 books. How many books does Kamal have? (Q27)
Geeta puts 7 apples in each of 5 baskets. How many apples in all? (Q28)
Himesh has 6 groups of 4 pens. How many pens does Himesh have? (Q29)
Indu has 8 packets. Each packet has 3 balls. How many balls in total? (Q30)
Jatin has 5 toys. Each toy has 2 eyes. How many eyes are there? (Q31)
Kavita has 6 cats. Each cat has 4 legs. How many legs are there? (Q32)
Lakshya plants 7 rows of flowers. Each row has 5 flowers. How many flowers are there? (Q33)
Mehul has 4 tables. Each table has 6 chairs. How many chairs are there? (Q34)
Nandini buys 9 packets of crayons. Each packet has 10 crayons. How many crayons are there? (Q35)
Om has 10 rupees. Piya gives him 8 rupees. How much money does Om have now? (Q36)
Ramu has 15 rupees. Renu gives him 12 rupees. How much money does Ramu have? (Q37)
Suresh has 20 rupees. Tina gives him 7 rupees. How much money in all? (Q38)
Urvashi has 5 rupees. Vinod gives her 9 rupees. How much does Urvashi have? (Q39)
Dhar has 25 rupees. Xavi gives him 10 rupees. How much money Dhar has now? (Q40)
Yogita has 30 rupees. Zubin has 18 rupees. How many more rupees does Yogita have? (Q41)
Aman has 40 rupees. Bhaskar has 22 rupees. How many fewer rupees does Bhaskar have? (Q42)
Charan has 50 rupees. Divya has 35 rupees. How much more does Charan have? (Q43)
Eklavya has 28 rupees. Farid has 15 rupees. How many more does Eklavya have? (Q44)
Gopal has 45 rupees. Hiral has 27 rupees. How many fewer does Hiral have? (Q45)
Ira sees 17 mango trees and 12 neem trees. How many trees are there in all? (Q101)
Jeevan sees 25 children playing football and 22 playing cricket. How many children are playing in total? (Q102)
Kanishka sees 25 rose plants with flowers and 14 without flowers. How many rose plants are there? (Q103)
Leena has 40 coconut trees. 15 were cut down. How many coconut trees are left? (Q104)
Milan counts 18 ducks. 7 fly away. How many ducks remain? (Q105)
Nupur sees 16 cows and 9 calves. How many animals are there? (Q106)
Ovi has 30 hens. 12 are sold. How many hens are left? (Q107)
Prithvi sees 24 fish in one tank and 11 in another. How many fish are there? (Q108)
Rani has 50 bricks. She uses 18. How many bricks remain? (Q109)
Ravina sees 21 butterflies and 14 dragonflies. How many insects are there? (Q110)
Sharad has 35 chairs. 19 are broken. How many chairs are usable? (Q111)
Tanisha counts 28 lanterns and 17 candles. How many light items are there? (Q112)
Uday sees 40 steps up and 16 steps down. How many steps in total? (Q113)
Vedika has 26 pots. She buys 9 more. How many pots now? (Q114)
Sumit sees 33 windows. 12 are closed. How many are open? (Q115)
Xaria has 18 plates and 27 bowls. How many utensils are there? (Q116)
Yashika finds 45 flowers. 20 are plucked. How many remain? (Q117)
Anaya sees 29 birds. 11 fly away. How many birds remain? (Q118)
Anvika has 22 kites. She gives away 8. How many left? (Q119)
Bhavin has 16 goats and 14 sheep. How many animals are there? (Q120)
